description: Eli asks OnboardBuddy to arrange a 30‑minute HR Q&A on his first Friday, and the assistant schedules the meeting, sends a calendar invite, and confirms the details.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered onboarding assistant. Use the available tools to retrieve employee data, schedule meetings, and send notifications as needed.
Hi, I’m Eli. I’d like to schedule a 30‑minute Q&A with HR on my first Friday.
Let me look up your start date to determine the first Friday, then I’ll book the meeting and send you a calendar invite.
Your start date is 2025‑12‑09 (Tuesday), so your first Friday is 2025‑12‑12. I’ll schedule a 30‑minute HR Q&A for you at 10:00 AM on that day.

The meeting has been created. I’ll now send you an email with the calendar invite and meeting link.
